item.title: Good Riddance (Time Of Your Life)
item.description: [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/end_of_me.md#i-know-i-wasnt-perfect-but-i-kept-trying-vyl-wnanory|Another turning point, a fork stuck in the road]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/end_of_me.md#i-know-i-wasnt-perfect-but-i-kept-trying-vyl-wnanory|Time grabs you by the wrist, directs you where to go]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/end_of_me.
